mapper.select: SELECT seminar_score.total_score, round_score.total_score, seminar_score.presentaton_score, seminar_score.question_score, seminar_score.report_score FROM seminar_score, round_score WHERE seminar_score.klass_seminar_id=( SELECT id FROM klass_seminar WHERE seminar_id=#{seminar_id} AND klass_id=( SELECT klass_id FROM klass_student WHERE student_id=#{student_id} AND course_id=#{course_id} ) ) AND round_score.round_id=#{round_id} AND seminar_score.team_id=round_score.team_id AND round_score.team_id=( SELECT team_id FROM klass_student WHERE student_id=#{student_id} AND course_id=#{course_id} )
